replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content: MCMMO高版本自带中文 把config里的Locale: 一项  en_US改成zh_CN即可

replies.author: SFSH
replies.txt_content: 。。。正常的思路是找到文件然后自己翻译。。吧

replies.txt_content:

你用最新版就可以了
